verses.roman:
tam ālokyāsurāḥ sarve
kalasaṁ cāmṛtābhṛtam
lipsantaḥ sarva-vastūni
kalasaṁ tarasāharan

synonyms: tam—him; ālokya—seeing; asurāḥ—the demons; sarve—all of them; kalasam—the container of nectar; ca—also; amṛta-ābhṛtam—filled with nectar; lipsantaḥ—desiring strongly; sarva-vastūni—all objects; kalasam—the jug; tarasā—immediately; aharan—snatched away.
translation: Upon seeing Dhanvantari carrying the jug of nectar, the demons, desiring the jug and its contents, immediately snatched it away by force.
